# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the function to call.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

The name needs to match one of the functions in the stitched library descriptor’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStitchedLibraryDescriptor/functions] property.

## Configuring a function node

- **arguments**: An ordered list of the nodes that provide the function’s arguments.
- **controlDependencies**: The list of nodes that need to execute before executing the node.
